translations: n．古物研究者，古董收藏家：研究或收藏古物、古董、古代艺术品的人。
· The antiquaries were excited to discover the ancient artifacts.
古物研究者们对发现这些古代文物感到兴奋。

sentences.sentence: The best antiquaries have now confuted Homer.
sentences.translation: 最好的考古学者已经将荷马驳倒了。

sentences.sentence: After presenting his report Akerman promptly resigned his position as secretary of the Society of Antiquaries claiming ill health.
sentences.translation: 在呈交了他的这份报告后，阿克曼便立即称病，辞去了自己古文物协会秘书的职位。
